ModMetaData.name: Coordinate Readout (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Noquiem
ModMetaData.description:
This is a continued version of [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2605167683]Coordinate Readout[/url] by Noquiem.
This mod simply adds coordinates to the UI readout, along with some settings to specify where. The continued version lets the player scale the text size, adjust the color and opacity, and gives a bit more freedom in placing the readout.
https://github.com/VitaKaninen/Coordinate-Readout-Continued
